name: Hunt
description:
HUNT is a gamified lifestyle DApp network for digital nomads all around the world. It aims to create a DApp world that empowers people to utilise the gamified blockchain and cryptocurrency mechanism. Currently, there are five DApps on the platform with over 200,000 users from 150+ countries all around the world.

Mint Club (https://mint.club/) - No-code/no-LP-required token building platform
Neverlose.money (https://neverlose.money/) - Gamified HODL Protocol for Long-term investors
Nomadtask (https://nomadtask.com/) - On-demand task marketplace
Steemhunt (https://steemhunt.com/) - Daily ranking community for cool new products
LOL Hunt (https://lol.hunt.town/) - Daily top chart for funny Youtube clips
